tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE researcher_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  research_field VARCHAR,
  data_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Investigations (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outlier_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (outlier_id) REFERENCES Outliers(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AnalysisLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    action_performed TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);
